If you dont have a life, nor life goals, nor any achievements, this is the perfect game for you. My biggest achievement in life was a double zeus in matchmaking. Those 845 hours brought cancer, anger, fun and good moments with it. :-)

This has been happening way too often lately. In the middle of the match someone starts a vote to change map, majority votes to change (I guess even the bots votes considering the amount of votes cast) and then the map is changed, the match does not end and all the experience is lost.
This game was good. Now it is pathetic with all the hackers. Vac Ban is totally non existing. Overview takes to long. Steam stop chasing money and fix the game.
